dict.acceptation: 全体船员；全体乘务员；一群，一帮；
当（尤指船上的）工作人员；当（尤指船上的）工作人员；

sent.orig: The parallel algorithm of combing feedback network in SIMD-CREW model is discussed.
sent.trans: 讨论并分析组合前馈网络在SIMD-CREW模型上的并行算法。

sent.orig: Okay. Melanie is the Executive Director of CREW-Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington.
sent.trans: 好的。米兰妮是华盛顿的CREW–公民责任和道德组织的执行总监。

sent.orig: Although the crew on site works hard, the crew in the kitchen works very hard too.
sent.trans: 虽然电影工作人员非常努力工作，但厨房的员工也同样努力。

sent.orig: Handles crew training, wages account, shore leaves and liaises with crew's families.
sent.trans: 处理船员的训练、薪酬帐目、休假等事宜，并与船员家属联络。

sent.orig: The captain and two loyal crew members are sent ashore by a rebellious crew.
sent.trans: 船长及两名忠实的水手被闹事的水手们遗弃在岸上。
